SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AchievementCard
Card representing an achievement to fulfill in game
Action
Represents a generic action that can be sent over the network.
ActionType
enumerative class that lists all the different types of action
AskingChatAction
Represents an action indicating a request to initiate a chat.
AskingDrawAction
Notifies the player to draw a card
AskingPlaceAction
notifies the player to place a card
AskingPlayersNumberAction
notifies the player of the number of current players
AskingStartAction
action to start the game
Card
Abstract class representing a generic card
CardDrawnAction
notifies the player of having successfully drawn a card
Chat
Represents a chat system in the game.
ChatMessageAction
Represents an action for sending a chat message between players.
ChooseableAchievementsAction
notifies the player of possible achievement cards to be chosen
ChooseSideStarterCardAction
notifies the player of the need of choosing the side of his starter card
ChosenAchievementAction
Represents an action indicating that a player has chosen an achievement card.
ChosenDrawCardAction
Represents an action indicating that a player has chosen to draw a card.
ChosenPlayersNumberAction
Represents an action indicating that a player has chosen the number of players for the game.
ChosenSideStarterCardAction
Represents an action indicating that a player has chosen a side for a starter card.
Client
 
ClientApp
ClientApp is the entry point for starting the client application.
ClientRmi
The ClientRmi class implements the VirtualView interface and handles RMI communication for the client.
ClientSocket
The ClientSocket class implements the VirtualView interface and handles the server socket communication with the client.
Color
This enum represents the color of the player
ConcreteStrategyDiagonal
Concrete strategy implementation for calculating points based on diagonal patterns in a player's area.
ConcreteStrategyItem
Concrete strategy implementation for calculating points based on a pattern that counts the items in a player's area.
ConcreteStrategyLshape
Concrete strategy implementation for calculating points based on a 'L shape' pattern in a player's area.
ConcreteStrategyMixed
Concrete strategy implementation for calculating points based on a mixed pattern in a player's area.
ConcreteStrategyResource
Concrete strategy implementation for calculating points based on a pattern that counts the resources in a player's area.
ConnectionAction
Represents an action indicating a connection event between clients.
Corner
 
CornerType
This enum represent the 4 types of corner a card can have
DisconnectedPlayerAction
Represents an action indicating that a player has disconnected.
ErrorAction
Represents an action indicating an error has occurred.
Game
Represents the main game instance with its state and components.
GameController
The GameController class is responsible for managing the game logic and interactions between players and the game model.
GameState
This enum represents the 8 phases of a game
GoldCard
GoldCard, card with requirements that can generate points for the player
GUIView
Main class for the GUI
HandAction
Represents an action that sends a hand of cards to a recipient.
Item
Enum representing the 3 different types of items in the game
JoiningPlayerAction
Represents an action indicating that a player has joined the game.
Listener
The Listener class is responsible for notifying clients about various events occurring in the game model.
LoginController
Controller for the login part of the graphical application
Message
Message that can be written by a user and sent to others
PingAction
Represents a ping action used to check the connectivity between the client and server.
PlacedCardAction
Represents an action indicating that a card has been placed by a player.
PlacedErrorAction
Represents an action indicating an error occurred while placing a card.
PlacingCardAction
Represents an action indicating that a player is placing a card on the game board.
PlayController
Controller for the actual game part of the graphical application
Player
User playing a game
Playground
Playground of a single player, where the cards are placed
PongAction
Represents a response action indicating a successful ping (pong).
Print
Util class for tui
ReconnectedPlayerAction
Represents an action indicating that a player has reconnected to the game server.
ReconnectionSuccessAction
Represents an action indicating a successful reconnection.
ReqPoint
enumerative class that lists all the different kinds of elements related to giving points by gold cards
Resource
enumerative class that lists all the four kinds of resources
ResourceCard
card representing mainly a resource, containing resources and also items
ServerApp
ServerApp is the entry point for starting the server of the game.
ServerSocket
The ServerSocket class implements the VirtualServer interface and handles the client socket communication with the server.
SetNicknameAction
Represents an action indicating that a player is setting their nickname.
Space
Represents a space in the game that can hold a card and has various states.
StartAction
Represents an action indicating that a player has initiated the start of the game.
StarterCard
kind of card which is first placed by all the players at the center of the board, who can only decide whether to place it on the front or back side
StartErrorAction
Represents an action indicating an error when attempting to start the game.
Strategy
Represents a strategy that can be executed with a given resource, player, and item.
StrategyInstanceCreator
A custom instance creator for the Strategy interface This class creates instances of specific strategy implementations based on a given type.
VirtualServer
The VirtualServer interface defines the methods that must be implemented by any class that acts as a server in the Model-View-Controller (MVC) pattern over a network.
VirtualView
The VirtualView interface defines the methods that must be implemented by any class that acts as a view in the Model-View-Controller (MVC) pattern over a network.
WaitAction
Represents an action indicating that a player needs to wait.
WebServer
WebServer is responsible for managing the network communication between the clients and the server.
WholeChatAction
Represents an action that sends the entire chat history to a client.
WinnersAction
Represents an action indicating the winners of the game.
